name: 7d3d game jam
description:
Worked around with this project in my free time at work. We originally had 3 people working on it but life got busy and we didn't get to do as much as we wanted to. 

As of now, you can only hit play and (i believe quit) from the menu. in play it is your typical shooter with randomly generated maps. Albeit there are only two map sections that load, but hopefully I will continue working on this game to where it is actually more interesting than a ship flying on a track.

You can also shoot

Thanks for Downloading!

-CrashBamboo
